title: AI for Everyone
description: This course, led by Andrew Ng, is designed for non-technical professionals and covers the impact of AI on business and society. It is free and takes about 10 hours to complete.

title: Machine Learning Specialization
description: This specialization is a beginner-friendly program that teaches the fundamentals of machine learning and how to use these techniques to build real-world AI applications. It includes multiple courses, providing a comprehensive introduction to machine learning.

title: Structuring Machine Learning Projects
description: This course focuses on how to structure machine learning projects to ensure success. It is suitable for beginners and covers key strategies and best practices for working on AI projects.

title: AI For Medical Diagnosis
description: This course provides an introduction to AI applications in medical diagnosis, covering the basics of AI technology and its implementation in healthcare settings. It is designed for beginners.
